title: Nightwish kicks out their female singer
content:
If I remember correct I've heard that there's couple of Nightwish fans around here (I am not one of them), I thought I could inform about this thing since it has caused a lot action in Finnish media. Although, it's probably mentioned around the globe many times.. Anyways, Nightwish has stopped co-operating with their female singer because of various reasons; here's an open letter they wrote to her (although this is translated version):
[url=http://www.nightwish.com/english/lettertotarjaen.html]www.nightwish.com/english...rjaen.html[/url]
And here's the singer's open reply to them:
[url=http://www.tarjaturunen.com/en/tarjaletter.html]www.tarjaturunen.com/en/tarjaletter.html[/url]Eat your veggies!

title: Hmm...
content:
Damn. Ah, well... from the sound of it, it's been a long time coming They've made some awesome music thus far, and at least all five of them are still in the scene so while the music might change a bit, it's not dead.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A proud member of the Made LevelLord Change Her Sig society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Hmm...
content:
Yeah I heard about it. It sucks, but Tuomas was responsible for most of the music so the consequences of a new singer might not be so horrible as it looks.-----------------
